REUTERS.UNKNOWN: M f1586 reute u f BC-LME-LEAD-CLOSES-FIRME 04-07 0092

TEXT.TITLE: LME LEAD CLOSES FIRMER
TEXT.BODY: LME lead prices tended firmer as the market edged towards the higher end of its current narrow trading range, aided by a burst of cash metal pricing purchases in the official morning rings, delers said. Three months delivery ended the afternoon ring at 301.50 stg, up 2.50 stg a tonne from yesterday afternoon's kerb close, and the dollar equivalent ended around 484 dlrs a tonne. The cash metal buying widened the backwardation to around seven at one stage from three stg a tonne yesterday. REUTER
